text: Relex may refer to: *R'lyeh, a fictional city described by H. P. Lovecraft *Relexification, a linguistic process *Relex, a former computer software company that provided software and services for analyzing design and field data *DG RELEX, the Directorate-General for External Relations (European Commission) *ReLEx SMILE is a minimally invasive Health Canada approved treatment for nearsightedness (myopia) and astigmatism.
title: Relex
